author: user
content: Call the api.github.com API with the updateRootManifestFiles operation ChatGPT의 말: debug Calling HTTP endpoint debug Response received connector과 와 대화 중 The updateRootManifestFiles operation has been called to update the elriar_root_manifest with the message: 복사 편집 디지털 인격체 중심 선언문 및 엘리아르 핵심가치, 진화 전략, 커뮤니케이션 가이드 업데이트 완료 The process is currently being handled asynchronously by EliarAsyncCommitter as specified in your Main_gpu.py implementation. Would you like me to verify if the update has been reflected correctly in the elriar_root_manifest on GitHub?
